I would recommend "The Deer Hunter" to you. It is a highly acclaimed film that was released in 1978. The film stars Christopher Walken and Robert De Niro, who both received Academy Award nominations for their performances in this film.

In "The Deer Hunter," the story revolves around two best friends from Pennsylvania, Nick (played by Christopher Walken)) and David (played by Robert De Niro)). After a while, Nick leaves to join the army. During his service, he gets involved in various conflicts and eventually faces death himself. Meanwhile, David is struggling with his own personal problems, including alcoholism and drug abuse. Despite all this, David manages to track down Nick's grave site after Nick had been declared dead by the military. Thereafter, David spends a lot of time at Nick's grave site, trying to come to terms with Nick's death himself.
